snippet.title: Plains Of Havoc | Demo Gameplay PC | Steam
snippet.description:
Dive into the Plains of Havoc, a 2D top-down roguelite where each death fuels your eternal glory. Earn Soul shards by slaying your enemies and exchange it for lasting upgrades to claim your place in the leaderboards.
Fight against endless hordes of monsters in the Viking afterlife, Valhalla! There are unlimited waves to survive against, but they each grow stronger than the last - the faster you defeat them the faster you'll level up. Survive for as long as you can until the wave overwhelms you in glorious death!
Choose from a range of upgrades during each run to match your playstyle! Zap your enemies with chain lightning, blow up their corpses to spread fire or go all out berserker and shred your way through the horde! Become even more powerful when you meet your inevitable demise through permanent upgrades, transcending the gods themselves!
